entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Akulivik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:03 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -32.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Akulivik Airport 4:00 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -32.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -45
Dewpoint: -37.0°C
Wind: SW 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 41.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 41. Wind chill minus 45 this evening and minus 54 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 35.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 35. Wind chill minus 55 in the morning and minus 45 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the evening. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 45 in the evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
